divs: sighting detailsi was sitting outside on the porch on the northwest side of tucson facing east when i saw two large orange pulsating\ flickering orb like objects slowly moving west. each orb was approximatly 5 miles from eachother in distance. a 3rd orb appeared and they all headed northwest once they got closer to the marana area. none of the orbs were in exact allignment with eachother and seemed to be going back and forth like they were scanning the areas around them. it seemed one dissapeard but the light was visible again after a few seconds .i first saw the lights on the ne side of tucson close to the mnt lemon area and they seemed to be headed west then quickly changed their direction north towards the phnx area. the lights slowly dissapeared and the duration of time was about 5 minutes of continuous visibility
trends: There have been 173 other sightings in Tucson
